  • Constructor Details

    • ProfileViewModel

      public ProfileViewModel(Player playerModel)
      Constructs the profile view model and sets the player model instance. Also sets the values of name, email and error label.
      Parameters:
      playerModel - player model instance

  • Method Details

      Returns:

    • saveChanges

      public boolean saveChanges(String name, String password)
      Saves changes in the profile to the database. Validates the given name and password and triggers the update functions in the player model if the validation was successful.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the player
      password - password of the player
      Returns:
      true if the saving was successful otherwise false
